nodes.text: The Dread Guard Commander was a Human male Dread Commander of the Dread Host during the Galactic War. He was the in charge of a Dread Host's legion that tried to acquire the Aurora Cannon in the Section X on Belsavis but a spacer defeated the Dread Guard Commander and his soldiers.
the Dread Guard Commander was the first member of the Dread host to appear in the game as boss in the Section X update.
